ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah lets look at the things he has said regarding the stuff he carries.... Flaming sword - No groups currently active have enough firepower to get the
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah lets look at the things he has said regarding the stuff he
carries....

Flaming sword - "No groups currently active have enough firepower to get
the Avenger"

Green Splinted Plate - "It would require several groups of 50 level
characters ready to die to get one piece"

Yet all the things he wears are "attainable".......If you have a bunch
of powergamer types all at level 50 that don't mind you taking all the
loot to get the gear.

> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 36
>
> From: CAB <Bash@...>
>
